data.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Double Agent®
data.detailed_description:
DOUBLE AGENT GAMEPLAY, BRANCHING STORYLINE

Experience the relentless tension and gut-wrenching dilemmas of life as a double agent. Play both sides and make critical choices between opposing NSA and terrorist objectives. You decide who to support and who to sabotage. Do whatever it takes, don’t blow your cover, and earn the terrorists’ trust. Your actions directly impact the story and gameplay, leading to dramatically different endings.

SIGNATURE STEALTH, UPGRADEABLE GEAR

Enjoy the renowned Splinter Cell stealth gameplay, now enhanced with upgradeable prototype gadgets and weapons – including improved night vision – based on your choices and covert skills.

A WORLD OF INTERNATIONAL ESPIONAGE

Travel from Shanghai and Cozumel to the heart of America, where cities like New York and Los Angeles are threatened by the terrorists' agenda of destruction.

IMMERSIVE ENVIRONMENTS

Carry out missions underwater amid churning ice floes, in blinding sandstorms, and through environments filled with dust and smoke.

Please note: online features for this game are no longer supported. Multiplayer and co-op modes are no longer functional.

data.short_description: In the sequel to the 2005 Game of the Year, Splinter Cell: Double Agent, play as legendary covert operative Sam Fisher, infiltrate a ruthless terrorist organization, and destroy it from within.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Supported OS: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: 3 Ghz Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 3000 (3.5 Ghz Pentium 4 or Athlon 3500 recommended) - Game optimized for dual-processor-enabled computers.
  • System Memory: 1 GB or above (1.5 GB recommended)
  • Video Card: DirectX 9.0c-compliant, Shader 3.0-enabled 128 MB video card (256 MB recommended) (see supported list*)
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible (EAX recommended) - PC audio solution containing Dolby Digital Live required for Dolby Digital audio.
  • DirectX Version: DirectX® version 9.0c or higher
  • Hard Disk: 8 GB available hard disk space
  • Multiplay: Broadband connection with 128 kbps upstream or faster
  • *Supported video cards at time of retail release: Single Player: ATI X1300 / X1600 / X1800 / X1900, NVIDIA 6200 / 6600 / 6800 / 7300 / 7600 / 7800 / 7900 | Multiplayer: ATI X1600 / X1800 / X1900, NVIDIA 6600 / 6800 /7300 / 7600 / 7800 / 7900
  • Note:Laptop versions of these cards may work but are NOT supported. These chipsets are the only ones that will run this game. For the most up-to-date minimum requirement listings, please visit the FAQ for this game on our support website at: .
